item.title: Ceylon Cinnamon | Cinnamon Breed | Home
item.description: cinnamonbreed tradings is a Sri Lankan Exports Company who are producing, distributing and exporting pure Ceylon cinnamon products, the business was started in 1989 by D.S De Silva as a cinnamon collector. Now it’s operating in exports business Cinnamonbreed is one of the best Cinnamon growers and exporters in Sri Lanka. Now it’s operating in exporting to the other part of the world. Having been involved in the Ceylon Cinnamon trade for more than a 3 decade they come with valu

item.title: Cinnamon Wholesale and Retail
item.description: Concentrating in Pure Ceylon Cinnamon, Breed cinnamon tradings produces a differentiated portfolio of pure spices for export merchandise. We grade our true cinnamon with different sizes and highly focusing on quality with different needs of our valued clients. We are produce and export several categories of Cinnamon wich are ALBA, 5C-SP, 5C, 4C, 5M, 4M, H1, H2, H2 FAQ, No 1 Quillings, No 2 Quillings, Cut Cinnamon, Cinnamon Powder, Cinnamon Leaves, Cinnamon Leaf Oil and also Cinnamon Bark

item.title: Contact us
